titles.title: To designate the New River Gorge National River in the State of West Virginia as the "New River Gorge National Park and Preserve", and for other purposes.
New River Gorge National Park and Preserve Designation Act
New River Gorge National Park and Preserve Designation Act
New River Gorge National Park and Preserve Designation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
New River Gorge National Park and Preserve Designation Act
This bill redesignates the New River Gorge National River in West Virginia as the "New River Gorge National Park and Preserve."
